original_text: The prison guard woke up. He saw that the prison doors were open. He thought that all the people in the prison had become free. He decided that he should kill himself. So he pulled out his sword.
korean_text: 간수가 자다가 깨어 옥문들이 열린 것을 보고 죄수들이 도망한 줄 생각하고 칼을 빼어 자결하려 하거늘

sentences.original_text: He saw that the prison doors were open
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 감옥 문들이 열려 있는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: He thought that all the people in the prison had become free
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 감옥에 있는 모든 사람들이 도망쳤다고 생각했다

sentences.original_text: He decided that he should kill himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 스스로 목숨을 끊어야 한다고 결심했다

sentences.original_text: So he pulled out his sword
